author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shire Plc Says ‍U.S. FDA Has Accepted Biologics License Application For Calaspargase Pegol​
text: February 28, 2018 / 7:21 AM / Updated 39 minutes ago BRIEF-Shire Plc Says ‍U.S. FDA Has Accepted Biologics License Application For Calaspargase Pegol​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Shire Plc: * U.S. FDA ACCEPTS SHIRE‘S BIOLOGICS LICENSE APPLICATION FOR CALASPARGASE PEGOL (CAL-PEG) FOR ACUTE LYMPHOBLASTIC LEUKEMIA (ALL) * ‍U.S. FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION (FDA) HAS ACCEPTED BIOLOGICS LICENSE APPLICATION (BLA) FOR CALASPARGASE PEGOL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
